news.title: Windows 11 has reached 1 billion users faster than Windows 10
news.summary: Windows 11 now has 1 billion users. Microsoft hit the milestone during the recent holiday quarter, meaning Windows 11 has managed to reach 1 billion users faster than Windows 10 did nearly six years ago. news.summary: Tesla will discontinue the Model S and Model X in the second quarter of 2026, Elon Musk said in an earnings call with investors today. news.title: Data Centers Are Driving a US Gas Boom
news.summary: Gas projects in the US pipeline explicitly linked to data centers increased by almost 25 times over the past two years, according to new research from Global Energy Monitor.

news.title: ICE Is Using Palantir’s AI Tools to Sort Through Tips
